title: Suspension
description: Schema for submitting a cell or nucleus suspension.

items.title: Derived from
items.description: A donor or sample from which this object was directly derived.

suspension_type.title: Suspension type
suspension_type.description: The type of suspension: cell or nucleus.

cell_concentration_units.title: Cell concentration units
cell_concentration_units.description: The units of the quantified cell/nucleus concentration.

cell_viability_method.title: Cell viability method
cell_viability_method.description: The method by which cell viability or nuclei integrity was assessed.

percent_cell_viability.title: Percent cell viability
percent_cell_viability.description: The number in percent of viable cells or intact nuclei.

enriched_cell_types.title: Enriched cell types
enriched_cell_types.description: Embedded property for linking to biosample types which describes the ontology of the enriched cell types.

items.title: Enriched cell type
items.description: Embedded property to linking to biosample type which describes the ontology of an enriched cell type.

enrichment_factors.title: Enrichment factors
enrichment_factors.description: The protein targets of antibodies or gene targets of genetic labeling or other enrichment factor.

depleted_cell_types.title: Depleted cell types
depleted_cell_types.description: Embedded property for linking to biosample type which describes the ontology of the depleted cell types.

items.title: Depleted cell type
items.description: Embedded property for linking to biosample type which describes the ontology of a depleted cell type.

cell_depletion_factors.title: Cell depletion factors
cell_depletion_factors.description: The protein targets of antibodies or gene targets of genetic labeling or other depletion factor.

cell_size.title: Cell size
cell_size.description: The measurement of the diameter of the cells.

cell_size_unit.title: Cell size unit
cell_size_unit.description: The units of measurement for cell size.

single_cell_isolation_method.title: Cell isolation method
single_cell_isolation_method.description: The method by which the cells or nuclei in the sample were isolated.
single_cell_isolation_method.comment: Indicate the method used to isolate cell(s) in the sample. For example Fluidigm C1 cell isolation should specify: microfluidic cell sorting.

single_cell_isolation_method_version.title: Cell isolation method version
single_cell_isolation_method_version.description: The version number of the single cell isolation method.

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: The medium in which the cells or nuclei are suspended.

collection_to_dissociation_interval.title: Collection-to-dissociation interval
collection_to_dissociation_interval.description: The amount of time elapsed between tissue collection and cell dissociation.

collection_to_dissociation_interval_unit.title: Collection-to-dissociation interval units
collection_to_dissociation_interval_unit.description: The unit in which the collection-to-dissociation time was reported.

death_to_dissociation_interval.title: Death-to-dissociation interval
death_to_dissociation_interval.description: The amount of time elapsed between donor death and cell dissociation.

death_to_dissociation_interval_units.title: Death-to-dissociation interval units
death_to_dissociation_interval_units.description: The unit in which the death-to-dissociation time was reported.

dissociation_reagent.title: Dissociation reagent
dissociation_reagent.description: The specific enzyme, mechanical method, and/or product used to dissociate tissue into cells or nuclei.

dissociation_time.title: Dissociation time
dissociation_time.description: The length of time the tissue was incubated with the dissociation reagent.

dissociation_time_units.title: Dissociation time units
dissociation_time_units.description: The units of time the tissue was incubated with the dissociation reagent.

red_blood_cell_lysis.title: Red blood cell lysis
red_blood_cell_lysis.description: If true, a red blood cell lysis step was included in the preparation protocol.

feature_antibodies.title: Feature antibodies
feature_antibodies.description: Antibodies used for cell surface protein detection in Feature Barcoding technologies (aka: CITEseq) during biosample preparation

items.title: Feature antibodies
items.description: Antibodies used for cell surface protein detection in Feature Barcoding technologies (aka: CITEseq) during biosample preparation
